divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:45 pm I was on my deck and saw a light that looked like a shooting star landing on earth near gray or kingsport tennessee. This looked about 25 to 30 miles away. about 10 min later in the same area I seen a light thatgot real bright and faded out it did not move from the position it just faded out. 5 min later two fighter jet flew ovewr in a v pattern one going toward asheville north carolina and the other toward knoxville tn fom my position. Again i have reported this to the national ufo site via phone. For some reason there is activity in the sky above my home. I have sent the UFO Hunters an email asking them if they would like to film from my deck because i live on a hill in the mountains of east tn. I live 90 miles east of oak ridge tn. I wish that i could get someones attention on this its very weird.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Jonesborough
There were no other sightings in Jonesborough on or around May 21st 2008
